snippet.title: Space Miner gameplay (PC Game, 1983)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Space Miner, Dos PC game produced by Charles Karp in 1983 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/space-miner/4328/
Space Miner is a futuristic game, arcade / shooter. You fly your ship to collect asteroids, minerals, comets and have to fight off the aliens.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Space Invaders (Dos clone, 1995) - https://youtu.be/5em8leAa8Po
Space Commanders - https://youtu.be/HiGDcmbUT_I
